text: Aotine betaherpesvirus 1 (AoHV-1) is a species of virus in the genus Cytomegalovirus, subfamily Betaherpesvirinae, family Herpesviridae, and order Herpesvirales. Night monkeys (Aotus spp.) serve as natural hosts. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Betaherpesvirinae
title: Aotine betaherpesvirus 1
